allow: Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "USE lilac_awards; SELECT id, institution, contact_email FROM mou_moa LIMIT 10;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "USE lilac_awards; DELETE FROM mou_moa WHERE institution IS NULL OR contact_email IS NULL;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "USE lilac_awards; SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM mou_moa;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "USE lilac_awards; ALTER TABLE mou_moa MODIFY COLUMN title VARCHAR(255) NULL;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "USE lilac_awards; SELECT id, institution, location, contact_email, file_name FROM mou_moa;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "USE lilac_awards; SHOW COLUMNS FROM mou_moa;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "USE lilac_awards; SELECT id, institution, type FROM mou_moa LIMIT 5;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "USE lilac_awards; SHOW COLUMNS FROM mou_moa WHERE Field = ''type'';")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "USE lilac_awards; SELECT id, username, role FROM users;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "USE lilac_awards; SHOW CREATE TABLE mou_moa\G")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "USE lilac_awards; SHOW TABLES LIKE ''other_documents'';")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "USE lilac_awards; SHOW COLUMNS FROM users;")
